actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Rice (NY) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A024) offered by Miss Rice (NY) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Miss Rice (NY) to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Page 340, strike line 9 and all that follows through page 347, line 25, and insert the following:    (f) State Graduated Driver Licensing Incentive Grant- Section 405(g)(2) of title 23, United States Code, is amended-- ***.
purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require states to strengthen graduated driver's licensing requirements to be eligible for State Graduated Driver Licensing Incentive Grants.
